channel.title: Login problems
channel.description: Well i used to code private servers but i started to migrate away from it, but now im back ^^. Well I downloaded a new client and server but when i set the ip on my Gui class to 127.0.0.1 i have no problem logging in but when i set it to my ip from no-ip DUC it says the server is offline. I have checked my port forwarding and ipconfig on my command prompt the ips are both set to 103 so i dont know why i cant log in =(. Is there anything else that i have to change that im not remembering? Please help, thanks

item.title: Login problems
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

Well i used to code private servers but i started to migrate away from it, but now im back ^^. Well I downloaded a new client and server but when i set the ip on my Gui class to 127.0.0.1 i have no problem logging in but when i set it to my ip from no-ip DUC it says the server is offline. I have checked my port forwarding and ipconfig on my command prompt the ips are both set to 103 so i dont know why i cant log in =(. Is there anything else that i have to change that im not remembering? Please help, thanks
